title: buddhi idu manamE
sahitya:
buddhi idu manamE eppOdum bhajanai shei sAdhu sangattilE


anupallavi

  ittilum attilum pittuk-koND-alaiyAdu cittam nilaittE hari bhakti sAdhanam shei


caraNam    mettap-paDittAlum viNNiyiDittAlum shettArai ezhuppiDum viddai naDittAlum
meddai mEl meddai kaTTi sottaik-kuvittAlum mEnmaiyillai paramAnma nilai peravE
